structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
A ORGANIZATION OF GOVERNMENT IN CITIES

law.catch_line: Composition and size of city legislative bodies for mayor-council, commission, and city manager plans.

text.section: Each city organized and governed under the mayor-council plan shall have a mayor and each shall have a legislative body composed of not less than six (6) nor more than twelve (12) members as prescribed by ordinance.
Each city organized and governed under the commission plan or city manager plan shall have a legislative body composed of a mayor and four (4) commissioners.

law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 13, effective January 1, 2015. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 435, sec. 7, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 434, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 235, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1980.
